# Edesa News and Events

## News Releases

#### [Edesa Biotech’s Founder Makes Strategic Investment in the Company](https://www.globenewswire.com/news-release/2024/10/31/2972601/0/en/Edesa-Biotech-s-Founder-Makes-Strategic-Investment-in-the-Company.html)

October 31, 2024

March 21, 2024
